name: Greater Death Butterfly Swarm
description: A Huge swarm of butterflies, embodying a terrifying fusion of beauty and danger with vibrant wings.
memorable: Its ability to affect undead creatures with poison makes it a unique threat.
goals: To swarm enemies and inflict debilitating poison damage.
relations: Can be encountered alongside undead foes.
environment: Typically found in locations where undead roam.
strengths: High Dexterity allows it to evade attacks, and immunity to various conditions enhances survivability.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold and fire damage; low Strength hinders physical engagements.
attacks: Can make two Bites attacks, dealing significant piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Potent Poison allows its attacks to affect even undead immune to poison.
additional_information: Cannot regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
Occupies the same space as creatures it attacks.
Weight of Wings ability can blind opponents and reduce their speed.
test_queries: huge poison swarm that can blind
